Table of Contents

Namespace osu.Framework.Testing

Classes

GridTestScene

An abstract test case which exposes small cells arranged in a grid. Useful for displaying multiple configurations of a tested component at a glance.

HeadlessTestAttribute

Denotes a "visual" test which should only be run in a headless context. This will stop the test from showing up in a TestBrowser.

ManualInputManagerTestScene

An abstract test case which is tested with manual input management.

MenuTestScene

A test scene that provides a set of helper functions and structures for testing a Menu.

MenuTestScene.MenuStructure

Helper class used to retrieve various internal properties/items from a Menu.

SetUpStepsAttribute

Denotes a method which adds TestScene steps. Invoked via RunSetUpSteps() (which is called from nUnit's [SetUp] or LoadTest(Type, Action, bool)).

SoloAttribute

Denotes a single test method which will be "solo"ed during visual execution. This implies all other tests will be ignored.

TearDownStepsAttribute

Denotes a method which adds TestScene steps at the end. Invoked via RunTearDownSteps() (which is called from nUnit's [TearDown] or LoadTest(Type, Action, bool)).

TemporaryNativeStorage

A temporary storage that can be used for testing purposes. Writes files to the OS temporary directory and cleans up on disposal.

TestBrowser
TestBrowserTestRunner
TestRunHeadlessGameHost

A GameHost which writes to the system temporary directory, attempting to clean up after the test run completes. Also runs in non-realtime (allowing faster test execution) by default.

TestScene
TestSceneTestRunner
TestSceneTestRunner.TestRunner
TestingExtensions

Interfaces

ITestSceneTestRunner

Enums

TestBrowserAction
